infos.value: By awakening and Limit Breaking, you can reach a new level of strength.
I can see that you were able to become a little bit stronger, Lord Mont. To continue, let us perform a Limit Break.
Aim high to repeatedly awaken and Limit Break your units. In my opinion, there is nothing more gratifying than this.
...That said, some materials are needed to do so. I will provide them to you this time, so do not fret.
I have prepared the necessary materials this time as well.

• Awakening •
By gathering enough necessary items, you can awaken your units.

Awakening a <color=#00ffff>unit</color> will increase its <color=#00ffff>level cap</color>. Also, awakening multiple times will allow you to acquire <color=#00ffff>new Jobs</color> and meet <color=#00ffff>Ability Board unlock requirements</color>.

• Limit Breaking •
By gathering enough of the necessary items, you can Limit Break your units.

Limit Breaking a <color=#00ffff>unit</color> will increase its <color=#00ffff>Job level cap</color>. Also, Limit Breaking multiple times will allow you to acquire <color=#00ffff>additional equipment slots</color>.
You can acquire special equipment known as a <color=#00ffff>Trust Master Reward</color> by both <color=#00ffff>awakening and Limit Breaking</color> a unit <color=#00ffff>five times each</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on Awakening and Limit Breaking?
